import React from "react"; import "./ordercards.css"; import { Row, Col, Dropdown, DropdownButton } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function OrdersCards(props) { const styles={ backgroundColor:" var(--primary-2) !important", border:" var(--primary-2) !important", width: "inherit !important" } return (
{props.orders.order_category}

ID:{props.orders.order_id}

{props.orders.product_name}

{props.orders.brand}

Quantity:{props.orders.quantity}

 Buyer Details Action Another action Something else Payment Details Action Another action Something else Shipping Action Another action Something else {props.orders.popularity}
); }
